draw.mission_task_and_description: Bull Troop Toys For Tots Ruck March (Neustadt an der Waldnaab to Windischeschenbach) 28DEC24

prepared_by.training_support_or_lesson_plan_or_opord: Bull Troop Toys For Tots Ruck March

subtasks.hazard: Hazard: Limited Visibility Effect: Vehicles hitting participants, Participants not seeing other hazards along the route

values: Participants will have headlamps and PT belts. Road guards will be stationed at all road crossings with PT belts, flash lights, and traffic cones. Route will seldom be on a road and will instead utilize trails
Initial: C-III-M
Residual: D-III-L
Include safety brief in convoy brief. Ensure participants and trail vehicle.
OIC, NCOIC, Safeties, CLS Certified SM

subtasks.hazard: Hazard: Fatigue Effect: injury, impaired judgement, illness

values: Ensure route is thoroughly reconnoitered and marked so participants do not ruck more than 12 miles
Roaming medic will monitor participants
Trail vehicle will collect participants that are unable to continue
Initial: D-II-M
Residual: D-III-L
Multiple recons, CLS Certified SM
OIC/NCOIC, CLS Certified SM

subtasks.hazard: Hazard: Inclement Weather Effect: Hot/cold weather injuries, increased risk for slipping

values: Soldiers have appropriate wet/cold weather gear.
Water points with each road guard
Roaming medics will monitor participants and have ice sheets and medical supplies.
Initial: C-III-M
Residual: C-II-L
Brief participants about hazards, roaming medics, WALK kits, ice sheets
NCOIC, Squad Leaders, CLS Certified SM

subtasks.hazard: Hazard: Civilian traffic Effect: collision with pedestrian

values: Ensure road guards and participants maintain situational awareness, look out for vehicles on the road. Participants and road guards wear reflective belts and headlamps
Initial: D-II-M
Residual: E-II-L
Brief participants and road guards of PPE expectations
OIC/NCOIC, Squad Leaders
